text: Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma zumgum harigi tugar, Gariri gari guman pana Herot ga vhegi. Herot tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨrve ga muuŋgiap, wom hɨgap, won ŋguga tɨn ana muuŋ Herodis ga tɨgi. Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma ne nzuav ana vhegi. Herot hɨgap, harigi bigɨna mbatɨga mueŋ phorga mba bigi tɨkhɨngiap, Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma suirav ana ndim bɨna khɨngi.
